name: Sussy Space
description:
A suspicious game (Not a virus) where you fight funne imposters floating through space. YOU can become the true sussy baka.

Click near objects for stuff (eg. computer in first room, knife in comms)

WASD to float through the air

Boost of walls and objects

Esc to pause

If you get stuck in the wall cause your idiocy somehow got past my 

impenetrable code /s you can teleport to spawn in the pause menu

Theres a lot i still wanted to add but ran outa time so much i needed to polish

The audio was so last minute D: still better than my last gamejams audio though

credit to https://sfbgames.itch.io/chiptone so i could get my audio in the last 10 mins

devlog comin soon...

will be in comments when done
